data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Sukhothai, Thailand honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sukhothai, Thailand
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Sukhothai access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.section_summary: On average, 83 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Sukhothai, Thailand.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Sukhothai.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Sukhothai, Thailand to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 661,693 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Nyaw people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Nyaw people know you.
God, we pray for the believers in Sukhothai, Thailand to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Sukhothai.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Sukhothai, Thailand so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
